content.raw:
[One of the gazebo jenkins builds](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64-gpu-none/420/) is giving [old cppcheck results](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64-gpu-none/420/cppcheckResult/). Those files it complains about were modified by a different pull request. When running the code check script, I see the following in the console output:

~~~
+ sh tools/code_check.sh -xmldir /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64-gpu-none/build/cppcheck_results
cppcheck: No C or C++ source files found.
~~~
content.html:
One of the gazebo jenkins builds is giving old cppcheck results. Those files it complains about were modified by a different pull request. When running the code check script, I see the following in the console output:

+ sh tools/code_check.sh -xmldir /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64-gpu-none/build/cppcheck_results
cppcheck: No C or C++ source files found.
